timeline.message:
Created tests

* Added faulttolerance_fat.tests.async project to test FT2.0+ @Asynchronous methods
* Added tests to check @Asynchronous methods return correct error messages when methods return null
* Added tests to check @Retry and @Fallback are NOT applied if an @Asynchronous method returns null
Implemented an error message for when a user's @Asynchrnous method returns null
Fixed and cleaned server.stopServer error codes and comments

timeline.bodyText: Try not to add incidental changes like this.
timeline.author: Azquelt

timeline.bodyText: This probably reads slightly better as one if statement with && rather than two, but there's not much in it.
timeline.author: Azquelt

timeline.message: Minor ID change in error message

timeline.bodyText: This could do with a better app name
timeline.author: Azquelt
